extendedInfo.description: BubbleUPnP is a full featured UPnP/DLNA Control Point,  UPnP Media Renderer and UPnP Media Server. Play easily your music, videos and images on your phone and devices on your network (DLNA TVs, XBMC, WMP, ...), from your external UPnP Media Servers. Play your phone/tablet media to those devices.Browse and play your local phone/tablet and cloud media from other devices (PS3, ...). BubbleUPnP can also be used as a standalone music player, even without any network connection.Free version has some limitations (see end of this description) that can be removed by purchasing the BubbleUPnP License app.Optional Internet Streaming:More than just regular LAN streaming, BubbleUPnP offer the unique feature to stream efficiently your media via the Internet over a mobile or WiFi connection. Internet streaming requires installing server software "BubbleUPnP Server" running on Windows, MacOS X, Linux or a NAS (it is not required for regular LAN streaming, see NOTE below). To learn more about BubbleUPnP Server and Internet streaming visit http://www.bubblesoftapps.com/bubbleupnpserverNOTE: YOU DO NOT NEED TO INSTALL BUBBLEUPNP SERVER FOR REGULAR UPNP/DLNA LAN STREAMING.Please submit any feedback and issues on http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1118891. For issues you can contact me directly as there is no way I can contact you with Market comments.Features:- Tablet, ICS, GoogleTV support, landscape mode- stream music and videos from your UPnP/DLNA Media Server (Twonky, Asset UPnP, any NAS with UPnP, ...) to your Android device.- Codecs supported for audio local playback: with system decoders: MP3, AAC (without DRM), WMA, Ogg Vorbis. With app's own decoders: WAV, FLAC, ALAC, LPCM. Samplerates > 48Khz and 24 bits supported for FLAC, WAV. - Video playback is delegated to an external app (VPlayer, MoboPlayer, DICE Player,...)- stream music/videos from your UPnP/DLNA Media Server to your UPnP renderers with regular playback controls (play, pause, seek, volume, ...). - UPnP Media Server: play your local phone/tablet media to other devices or to your Android device (standalone media player). Browse and play your local phone/tablet media from other devices (PS3, WMP, ...). Able to browse the SD Card. Google Music and Dropbox streaming supported- UPnP renderer: control media playback of your android device from another UPnP Control point- Internet streaming/downloading over a mobile or WiFi connection with BubbleUPnP Server- UPnP tethering with BubbleUPnP Server (makes Media Servers from a LAN visible on another LAN)- Download tracks, full albums and videos from your Media Server to your android device (with covers if available), to make them available in your favorite Android music and media player- can play additional media to renderer through 3rd party apps: shoutcast radio (XiiaLive), youtube, dailymotion,... (semperVidLinks)- Gallery-like image viewer- Mute / Repeat / Shuffle- Editable playlist to queue tracks for playback- Fully editable saved playlists- Shuffle Playlist- Shuffle Library (shuffle tracks from your entire Media Server)- Scrobbling support- Sleep Timer- Display album art- Display artist info from Last.fm (requires Last.fm app)- Powerful UPnP Search. Search for tracks, albums, artists and videos (exact support depends on Media Server)- Bookmarks. Access quickly albums and folders- Random track list generation. Discover forgotten gems in your Library- Multiple selection. swipe many items to apply a common operationBubbleUPnP free version limitations:- ads- Internet streaming with BubbleUPnP Server is limited to 30 minutes per app launch- Playlist and Library Shuffle are limited to 16 tracks- downloads limited to batches of maximum 40 tracks- the local renderer is remotely controllable by external Control Points for 30 mins per app launch- the local Media Server is not browsable by filesystem (SD Card)- playing media from external apps is limited to 3 plays per app launch

reviews.title: Excellent app, works perfectly!!
reviews.comment: I\'m using the application on my home where I have 4 android devices, 2 laptops and one laptop for the tv as media center. Everything works perfectly, specially now that they fixed the OpenHome issue.
reviews.author: Manuel Monteagudo

reviews.comment: Downloaded free app, seemed to be what I needed so bought licence. Now spent over 1 hour installing, unistalling over and again but it still keeps telling me its unlicensed. What a bag of crap.\tAs above
reviews.author: Trevor Speight

reviews.title: Great for streaming pod/vodcasts
reviews.comment: I love podcasts, they let me keep up to date with my favorite shows easily. However, I hate the choice of downloading them again on my PC or watching them on the tablets\' much smaller screen when I\'m at home. This app and pocketcasts solve that problem by streaming downloaded podcasts to my PC. Only gripe is that I\'d like playback progress to be synced when streaming, so I watch from where I left off and when I stop watching, that progress gets updated. This would bump my rating up to a 5 star.
reviews.author: Christopher Thomson

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Tried this on my Stream Magic 6 after atrocious Cambridge Audio excuse for an app. After about month of constant use, haven\'t really found a problem. It is stable, feature full and fairly customizable. Purchasing a full version was worth it too. Thanks for this stellar app guys!
reviews.author: Srdjan Avramov

reviews.title: Not that bad
reviews.comment: It\'s by far my most loved but has issues that need urgent review! As server, it stops responding occasionally when there is sudden change of media type or stop synchronizing with player. Also very cumbersome if at all possible to stream to and control different multiple devices at a time. Lastly for sake of we plasma TV users, I think a nice screen saver option should be included to prevent our TVs from burn out!
reviews.author: Nurudeen Lawal Said

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Streams from anywhere to anywhere really really well. Regularly use it to stream the flac files on my WD mybooklive
reviews.author: Rahul Md

reviews.title: Minor Fixes?
reviews.comment: Paha, minor fixes huh? I can now officially download a Youtube video in its highest resolution, convert it into two different types of format, upload it to an online storage site, turn around and store it on a home media server and play it onto my computer/Xbox hooked up to that home server before this application can find the Youtube video and \"play-to\" my Xbox. Great fixes. This is what happens when you fix something that doesn\'t seem to be broken.
reviews.author: Jon Harrison

reviews.title: ...was good
reviews.comment: Everything was working great last time I used this but all the updates since have messed it up and now I can\'t send video clips to my TV
reviews.author: Gary Germain

reviews.title: Sony TV won\'t connect as media renderer most of the time
reviews.comment: I have Samsung note ii and  lg nexus 4 Lg nexus 4 has bubble upnp renderer it has lot of problems in detecting Sony kdl-42w800a But note ii has default Samsung video player it won\'t have a problem in detecting TV as renderer With bubble upnp note ii won\'t detect Sony tv Please rectify the above problem as quick as possible to get your stars back

reviews.title: 1st class app.
reviews.comment: Use most days, cannot fault. Well worth the cost.

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Works fine on my sony bluray player in my living room but not on my samsung in my bedroom. Kinda wanted it for my bedroom one but just wont connect.
